content: They were both impressed with the fishing, and we all had a great time together. We actually grilled the fish we caught on the shore, and it was delicious! The whole trip was just a really great experience, and I'm already thinking about planning our next fishing adventure. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for good fishing spots for trout? I've been wanting to try my hand at fly fishing again, and I've heard some great things about trout fishing in the nearby streams.
